data.title: RAS AND BRISBANE ROBOTICS INTEREST GROUP JOINT MEETING : vTools eNotice
data.meta_description: IEEE vTools, providing tools to the volunteers and staff who support our members.
data.text:
The Brisbane Robotics Interest Group and the IEEE QLD CS/RAS joint chapters will be meeting at QUT Gardens Points S Block Level 11, in the S11 Cantina on Thurs evening (6:15pm) (https://www.meetup.com/Brisbane-Robotics-Interest-Group/events/235719007/ if you want to RSVP)

Special guests for this meeting:

• Luis Mejias Alvarez who is the QLD chair for the IEEE CS/RAS section will give a quick introduction to the IEEE QLD section

• Prasanna Srikhanta is an early stage angel investor, and will talk about what he thinks are the great opportunities for startups in Brisbane, and his background in investing (including Wish, Everlaw, Osaro, Zimperium, Uplevel Security and Go Car Insurance). His focus is primarily cyber-security and machine intelligence, looking for companies that seek to push the boundaries of what is possible and aim for long term independence. Prasanna was a member Mithril’s investment team (that’s Peter Thiel’s growth fund), and before that he was a Lead Engineer at Plumtree Software Inc., which was later acquired by BEA Systems in 2005 (and itself acquired by Oracle in 2008). He is a QUT IT graduate.

Please come join us for our monthly robotics meetup, and as always, feel free to bring your ideas and robots to show off - we'll open the floor for project introductions and pitches.

Agenda

• 18:15 - 18:30 Welcome and BRIG introduction, Juxi

• 18:30 - 18:45 IEEE QLD; Luis Mejias Alvarez

• 18:45 - 19:00 About startups; Prasanna Srikhanta

Followed by

- some tours through the robotics lab

- robotics discussions, questions, answers, and maybe some basic hands-on

- more cold beverages

Thanks to the Group’s sponsors: QUT, the ACRV, and the IEEE QLD Joint Chapters on Control Systems/Robotics and Automation Society.
